snippet.title: Blizzard® Arcade Collection – Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Fire up your time machine and let the carnage begin! Relive the legacy of three Blizzard classics—The Lost Vikings®, Rock N Roll Racing®, and Blackthorne®—with the Blizzard® Arcade Collection, available now on Windows®10 PC, Nintendo Switch™, PlayStation®4, and Xbox One. 

Learn more: https://blizz.ly/ReliveTheLegacy

Get on PC: https://blizz.ly/3pqVdYi
Get on Nintendo Switch: https://blizz.ly/37nHY4p 
Get on PS4: https://blizz.ly/3tZwAW5 
Get on Xbox One: https://blizz.ly/3s6nZzb








For more information, visit Blizzard.com.
Like Blizzard on Facebook: facebook.com/Blizzard/
Like Blizzard on Instagram: instagram.com/blizzard/
Follow Blizzard on Twitter: twitter.com/blizzard_ent
Blizzard is hiring: blizzard.com/company/careers/
